Catering for any Occasion

We cater to private and corporate functions, on location or out of the house.

Fresh 'n Wild at Utopia in Klein Windhoek, is an ideal venue for special occassions, from weddings, private parties to corporate events. Our premises at Utopia offers ample parking and has boardroom facilities.

Together with you, we will create a menu that suits your taste, budget, and style.

Contact us for a free quotation
